channel.title: BattleScape - Choose-able Models
channel.description:
[CENTER][B][URL=http://"http://www.battle-scape.com"][IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/fpa61x.jpg[/img][/URL] [U][COLOR=#FFA500][SIZE=3]Introduction[/SIZE][/COLOR][/U] [I]One of the oldest private servers around - history starting from before 2007. Some previous names include BattleScape Isle, BattleScape Blitz, BattleScape 317, and BattleScape 523. The client has the ability to load different models depending on your preferred era of RuneScape, all while still playing the same server. Character Model/Emote Selection: 474, 525, 562, 603, 718[/I] [U][COLOR=#FFA500][SIZE=3]Play Now[/SIZE][/COLOR][/U] [I][IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/6duwsk.png[/img] [URL=http://www.battle-scape.com/forum.php]Forums[/URL] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/3vpye.png[/img] [URL=http://www.battle-scape.com/register.php]Register[/URL] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/2s1reqe.png[/img] [URL=http://www.battle-scape.com/pages.php?pageid=2]Play Now[/URL][/I] [U][SIZE=3][COLOR=#FFA500]Server Information[/COLOR][/SIZE][/U] • [COLOR=#00FF00]100%[/COLOR] UPTIME • 300+ PLAYERS ONLINE • 30,000 REGISTERED MEMBERS • Windows and Mac supported client • DDoS Protected Server (No lag) [U][SIZE=3][COLOR=#FFA500]20 Game Features[/COLOR][/SIZE][/U] • MANY client graphic settings • Pest Control (COD: Zombies Version) • Dominion Tower (Completion/Survival) • HighScores (Custom PKScores added) • Great Staff Team (Quick support) • One of the best economies • EP system with PK points • God Wars (Bandos, Armadyl) • Duel Arena • 63 Wave Fight Caves • Barrows • Corporeal Beast/Tormented Demons • Ancient and Lunar magic • Equipment such as PvP weapons, Chaotics, Staff of Light, etc. • Over 10 bosses • 2 Worlds • Auras • Mini-Quests • Fast combat training, but slow skill training. • Casino (Blackjack - gambling) [U][COLOR=#FFA500][SIZE=3]Updates![/SIZE][/COLOR][/U]
Updates * The home location has been moved to Shilo. Most of the content involving skilling has been relocated here. * The Firemaking skill has been added. * Slayer Points have been added when you finish an assignment. * Added my own version of Social Slayer (read about it from an enchanted gem or ring of slaying). * Ring of slaying has teleports to Vannaka, the Slayer Tower, the gold member Slayer dungeon, and the Ancient Cavern Slayer Dungeon. * Added a Slayer dungeon in the Ancient Cavern. Adjustments * Slayer XP rate has a 50% increase in the Wilderness. * Random event rewards now can give money caskets, rare money caskets, and treasure trail caskets. * Crystal chest rewards now can give money caskets, rare money caskets, and treasure trail caskets. * Ancient magic can now be cast with any staff. Bug Fixes * Fixed fire strike/bolt on graphics under 718. * Fixed the Dragon scimitar and other swords on 718. Ancient Cavern Slayer Dungeon Pyrefiend: Mind body, Body body (30 Slayer) Rum-pumped crab: Brackish blade (61 Slayer) Skeletal wyvern: Granite shield, Granite legs (72 Slayer) Desert strykewyrm: Focus sight (77 Slayer) Jungle strykewyrm: Hexcrest (73 Slayer) Mutated jadinko male: Abyssal vine whip (91 Slayer) Mutated jadinko males drop Abyssal vine whips, which are untradable. On death, they will turn into an Abyssal whip.
* Runecrafter robes added to the EP Point Shop in Edgeville. Each piece is 40 points and they are untradable. * The affects of the Phoenix necklace have been added. * The full Dragon scimitar special attack has been added. * A barrage runes set has been added to the Vote Points Shop.
* A new dungeon has been added inside Taverly Dungeon, found at the Obelisk of Fire. * The new dungeon contains Chaos dwarf hand cannoneers, Ork legions, and Bork. * Chaos dwarf hand cannoneers drop Hand cannon shots and the key needed to get into Bork's room. * Ork legions drop Granite maces. * Bork drops Bandos dragonhide (equal to black dragonhide) and the Hand cannon.
[U][COLOR=#FFA500][SIZE=3]Videos[/SIZE][/COLOR][/U] [B]Pk Video[/B]: [URL=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=74Ypo2IkRV0]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=74Ypo2IkRV0[/URL] [B]Funny Video[/B]: [URL=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fJzvh4EpY68]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fJzvh4EpY68[/URL] [B]Clan Video[/B]: [URL=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=E52LbVu2wgc]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=E52LbVu2wgc[/URL] [B]Staking Video[/B]: [URL=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YgoZ9JyTeXc]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YgoZ9JyTeXc[/URL] [B]718 Magic Animations[/B]: [URL=http://youtu.be/vLwEPdvGuBQ]http://youtu.be/vLwEPdvGuBQ[/URL] [U][COLOR=#FFA500][SIZE=3]Pictures[/SIZE][/COLOR][/U] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/r2opyg.png[/img] [B][U]High Detail [In Progress][/U][/B] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/98v7fs.png[/img] [B][U]Clan Wars[/U][/B] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/15pl3zp.png[/img] [B][U]Casino[/U][/B] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2lo3wbn.png[/img] [B][U]Wilderness Map[/U][/B] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2ah5u2e.png[/img] [B][U]Wilderness[/U][/B] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/6gk3m8.png[/img] [B][U]718 Graphics[/U][/B] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/34j42o6.png[/img] [B][U]"New format models loading textures on the old engine"[/U][/B] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/10z8m83.png[/img] [B][U]Boss Killing and Drops[/U][/B] [u][b]Tormented Demons[/b][/u] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/n4hbg8.png[/img] [u][b]Godwars[/b][/u] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/xeh1rs.png[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/2komlw.png[/img] [/B][/CENTER]

Instead of having him update the game constantly try and do something with those revolting forums.

Read full topic

item.title: BattleScape - Choose-able Models
item.dc:creator: @Grand_Exchange Grand Exchange
item.description:
@Grand_Exchange wrote:

[QUOTE=Palidino]Fight Kiln
The Fight Kiln minigame is now in Gold Member beta. Please note that finishing the minigame will [COLOR=#ff0000]NOT[/COLOR] reward you the cape.
The minigame needs testing for bugs, but also to determine if it’s too easy or too hard.
The requirements and cost has been disabled for the beta.
To start the minigame, click the entrance you normally would for the Fight Cave.
If you test it out and are willing to make a video, post the link in this thread.

Fight Cave now displays an interface with what wave you’re on.[/QUOTE]

[QUOTE=Palidino]Bounty Hunter is now in beta!

To get there, talk to Mandrith in Edgeville.
Please note that it is in beta for a reason: don’t take items inside that you aren’t willing to lose until it has been fully tested for bugs.

Known To-Dos:
It uses the wrong overlay interface.
The viewing orbs don’t work yet.
There is no point system for target kills.

Notes:
On death, untradable items will be kept in your inventory even if you aren’t a Gold Member.
There is a pickup and leave penalty for not killing your target.
All three craters work.
Equipment past 2007 can’t be taken in (with the exception of RC robes).
Combat XP disabled inside to stop low/mid crater abuse.
You can’t see drops from players you didn’t kill (even after the ground item display timer hits 0).

2gwamoh.png800×485
[/QUOTE]

2 kind of big things that were recently added.

Read full topic

item.title: BattleScape - Choose-able Models
item.dc:creator: @UGot0wned UGot0wned
item.description:
@UGot0wned wrote:

August 19th Update

Updates

  • The home location has been moved to Shilo. Most of the content involving skilling has been relocated here.
  • The Firemaking skill has been added.
  • Slayer Points have been added when you finish an assignment.
  • Added my own version of Social Slayer (read about it from an enchanted gem or ring of slaying).
  • Ring of slaying has teleports to Vannaka, the Slayer Tower, the gold member Slayer dungeon, and the Ancient Cavern Slayer Dungeon.
  • Added a Slayer dungeon in the Ancient Cavern.

Adjustments

  • Slayer XP rate has a 50% increase in the Wilderness.
  • Random event rewards now can give money caskets, rare money caskets, and treasure trail caskets.
  • Crystal chest rewards now can give money caskets, rare money caskets, and treasure trail caskets.
  • Ancient magic can now be cast with any staff.

Bug Fixes

  • Fixed fire strike/bolt on graphics under 718.
  • Fixed the Dragon scimitar and other swords on 718.

Ancient Cavern Slayer Dungeon
Pyrefiend: Mind body, Body body (30 Slayer)
Rum-pumped crab: Brackish blade (61 Slayer)
Skeletal wyvern: Granite shield, Granite legs (72 Slayer)
Desert strykewyrm: Focus sight (77 Slayer)
Jungle strykewyrm: Hexcrest (73 Slayer)
Mutated jadinko male: Abyssal vine whip (91 Slayer)
Mutated jadinko males drop Abyssal vine whips, which are untradable. On death, they will turn into an Abyssal whip.

r2opyg.png715×335

292theh.png723×334

16c5dn7.png717×333

Read full topic

item.title: BattleScape - Choose-able Models
item.dc:creator: @UGot0wned UGot0wned
item.description:
@UGot0wned wrote:

[CENTER][B]

[COLOR=#FFA500][SIZE=3]Introduction[/SIZE][/COLOR]

[I]One of the oldest private servers around - history starting from before 2007.
Some previous names include BattleScape Isle, BattleScape Blitz, BattleScape 317, and BattleScape 523.

The client has the ability to load different models depending on your preferred era of RuneScape, all while still playing the same server.
Character Model/Emote Selection: 474, 525, 562, 603, 718[/I]

[COLOR=#FFA500][SIZE=3]Play Now[/SIZE][/COLOR]

[I] Forums

Register

Play Now[/I]

[SIZE=3][COLOR=#FFA500]Server Information[/COLOR][/SIZE]

• [COLOR=#00FF00]100%[/COLOR] UPTIME
• 300+ PLAYERS ONLINE
• 30,000 REGISTERED MEMBERS
• Windows and Mac supported client
• DDoS Protected Server (No lag)

[SIZE=3][COLOR=#FFA500]20 Game Features[/COLOR][/SIZE]

• MANY client graphic settings
• Pest Control (COD: Zombies Version)
• Dominion Tower (Completion/Survival)
• HighScores (Custom PKScores added)
• Great Staff Team (Quick support)
• One of the best economies
• EP system with PK points
• God Wars (Bandos, Armadyl)
• Duel Arena
• 63 Wave Fight Caves
• Barrows
• Corporeal Beast/Tormented Demons
• Ancient and Lunar magic
• Equipment such as PvP weapons, Chaotics, Staff of Light, etc.
• Over 10 bosses
• 2 Worlds
• Auras
• Mini-Quests
• Fast combat training, but slow skill training.
• Casino (Blackjack - gambling)

[COLOR=#FFA500][SIZE=3]Updates![/SIZE][/COLOR]

Updates * The home location has been moved to Shilo. Most of the content involving skilling has been relocated here. * The Firemaking skill has been added. * Slayer Points have been added when you finish an assignment. * Added my own version of Social Slayer (read about it from an enchanted gem or ring of slaying). * Ring of slaying has teleports to Vannaka, the Slayer Tower, the gold member Slayer dungeon, and the Ancient Cavern Slayer Dungeon. * Added a Slayer dungeon in the Ancient Cavern.

Adjustments

  • Slayer XP rate has a 50% increase in the Wilderness.
  • Random event rewards now can give money caskets, rare money caskets, and treasure trail caskets.
  • Crystal chest rewards now can give money caskets, rare money caskets, and treasure trail caskets.
  • Ancient magic can now be cast with any staff.

Bug Fixes

  • Fixed fire strike/bolt on graphics under 718.
  • Fixed the Dragon scimitar and other swords on 718.

Ancient Cavern Slayer Dungeon
Pyrefiend: Mind body, Body body (30 Slayer)
Rum-pumped crab: Brackish blade (61 Slayer)
Skeletal wyvern: Granite shield, Granite legs (72 Slayer)
Desert strykewyrm: Focus sight (77 Slayer)
Jungle strykewyrm: Hexcrest (73 Slayer)
Mutated jadinko male: Abyssal vine whip (91 Slayer)
Mutated jadinko males drop Abyssal vine whips, which are untradable. On death, they will turn into an Abyssal whip.

* Runecrafter robes added to the EP Point Shop in Edgeville. Each piece is 40 points and they are untradable. * The affects of the Phoenix necklace have been added. * The full Dragon scimitar special attack has been added. * A barrage runes set has been added to the Vote Points Shop.
* A new dungeon has been added inside Taverly Dungeon, found at the Obelisk of Fire. * The new dungeon contains Chaos dwarf hand cannoneers, Ork legions, and Bork. * Chaos dwarf hand cannoneers drop Hand cannon shots and the key needed to get into Bork's room. * Ork legions drop Granite maces. * Bork drops Bandos dragonhide (equal to black dragonhide) and the Hand cannon.
